<Link id="l00301" /><CodeLine lineNumber="301" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/functionpropertiesprinterpass/#aac1f30e6e61c72eaa61dc3daf83dc588"><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/functionpropertiesprinterpass/#aac1f30e6e61c72eaa61dc3daf83dc588">FunctionPropertiesPrinterPass::run</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#adce09a5a0de0e3177eb00e932734af2f">FunctionAnalysisManager</a> &amp;AM) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00302" /><CodeLine lineNumber="302"><Highlight kind="normal">  OS &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Printing analysis results of CFA for function &quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00303" /><CodeLine lineNumber="303"><Highlight kind="normal">     &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;&#39;&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>.getName() &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;&#39;:&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00304" /><CodeLine lineNumber="304"><Highlight kind="normal">     &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;\\n&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00305" /><CodeLine lineNumber="305"><Highlight kind="normal">  AM.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/analysismanager/#aaab1fad63e4f3b8679469720a873fedd">getResult</a>&lt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/functionpropertiesanalysis">FunctionPropertiesAnalysis</a>&gt;(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>).<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a50bf746ca1858c0e272e3a802fc27942">print</a>(OS);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00306" /><CodeLine lineNumber="306"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/preservedanalyses/#a1258a1ff55557c27684010ebd7283712">PreservedAnalyses::all</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00307" /><CodeLine lineNumber="307"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00308" /><CodeLine lineNumber="308"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00309" /><CodeLine lineNumber="309" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/functionpropertiesupdater/#a1ba00e4f051e690dfe2e14625ce165d3"><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/functionpropertiesupdater/#a1ba00e4f051e690dfe2e14625ce165d3">FunctionPropertiesUpdater::FunctionPropertiesUpdater</a>(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00310" /><CodeLine lineNumber="310"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/functionpropertiesinfo">FunctionPropertiesInfo</a> &amp;FPI, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/callbase">CallBase</a> &amp;CB)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00311" /><CodeLine lineNumber="311"><Highlight kind="normal">    : FPI(FPI), CallSiteBB(&#42;CB.<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/basicaliasanalysis-cpp/#a1b8850f1ed44c12bc3501175a71c251c">getParent</a>()), Caller(&#42;CallSiteBB.<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/basicaliasanalysis-cpp/#a1b8850f1ed44c12bc3501175a71c251c">getParent</a>()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00312" /><CodeLine lineNumber="312"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a92ca992e52dddc420f4b069cae06dfbe">isa&lt;CallInst&gt;</a>(CB) || <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a92ca992e52dddc420f4b069cae06dfbe">isa&lt;InvokeInst&gt;</a>(CB));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00313" /><CodeLine lineNumber="313"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// For BBs that are likely to change, we subtract from feature totals their</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00314" /><CodeLine lineNumber="314"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// contribution. Some features, like max loop counts or depths, are left</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00315" /><CodeLine lineNumber="315"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// invalid, as they will be updated post-inlining.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00316" /><CodeLine lineNumber="316"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrset">SmallPtrSet&lt;const BasicBlock &#42;, 4&gt;</a> LikelyToChangeBBs;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00317" /><CodeLine lineNumber="317"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The CB BB will change - it&#39;ll either be split or the callee&#39;s body (single</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00318" /><CodeLine lineNumber="318"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// BB) will be pasted in.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00319" /><CodeLine lineNumber="319"><Highlight kind="normal">  LikelyToChangeBBs.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrsetimpl/#a9d834ae3da8c62c2b668dada51335eb0">insert</a>(&amp;CallSiteBB);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00320" /><CodeLine lineNumber="320"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00321" /><CodeLine lineNumber="321"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The caller&#39;s entry BB may change due to new alloca instructions.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00322" /><CodeLine lineNumber="322"><Highlight kind="normal">  LikelyToChangeBBs.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrsetimpl/#a9d834ae3da8c62c2b668dada51335eb0">insert</a>(&amp;&#42;Caller.begin());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00323" /><CodeLine lineNumber="323"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00324" /><CodeLine lineNumber="324"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The successors may become unreachable in the case of &#96;invoke&#96; inlining.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00325" /><CodeLine lineNumber="325"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We track successors separately, too, because they form a boundary, together</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00326" /><CodeLine lineNumber="326"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// with the CB BB (&#39;Entry&#39;) between which the inlined callee will be pasted.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00327" /><CodeLine lineNumber="327"><Highlight kind="normal">  Successors.insert(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9aa408bc83db2292cc1a57a3e6b206c2">succ&#95;begin</a>(&amp;CallSiteBB), <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa5684e4976198c1b64b694d3972ddf78">succ&#95;end</a>(&amp;CallSiteBB));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00328" /><CodeLine lineNumber="328"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00329" /><CodeLine lineNumber="329"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the outcome of the inlining may be that some edges get lost (DCEd BBs</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00330" /><CodeLine lineNumber="330"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// because inlining brought some constant, for example). We don&#39;t know which</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00331" /><CodeLine lineNumber="331"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// edges will be removed, so we list all of them as potentially removable.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00332" /><CodeLine lineNumber="332"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Some BBs have (at this point) duplicate edges. Remove duplicates, otherwise</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00333" /><CodeLine lineNumber="333"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the DT updater will not apply changes correctly.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00334" /><CodeLine lineNumber="334"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/denseset">DenseSet&lt;const BasicBlock &#42;&gt;</a> Inserted;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00335" /><CodeLine lineNumber="335"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;Succ : <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a26e2a938b431eaa6eca2beaa96410c9d">successors</a>(&amp;CallSiteBB))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00336" /><CodeLine lineNumber="336"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Inserted.insert(Succ).second)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00337" /><CodeLine lineNumber="337"><Highlight kind="normal">      DomTreeUpdates.emplace&#95;back(DominatorTree::UpdateKind::Delete,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00338" /><CodeLine lineNumber="338"><Highlight kind="normal">                                  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const&#95;cast&lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">&gt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(&amp;CallSiteBB),</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00339" /><CodeLine lineNumber="339"><Highlight kind="normal">                                  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const&#95;cast&lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">&gt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(Succ));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00340" /><CodeLine lineNumber="340"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Reuse Inserted (which has some allocated capacity at this point) below, if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00341" /><CodeLine lineNumber="341"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// we have an invoke.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00342" /><CodeLine lineNumber="342"><Highlight kind="normal">  Inserted.clear();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00343" /><CodeLine lineNumber="343"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Inlining only handles invoke and calls. If this is an invoke, and inlining</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00344" /><CodeLine lineNumber="344"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// it pulls another invoke, the original landing pad may get split, so as to</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00345" /><CodeLine lineNumber="345"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// share its content with other potential users. So the edge up to which we</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00346" /><CodeLine lineNumber="346"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// need to invalidate and then re-account BB data is the successors of the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00347" /><CodeLine lineNumber="347"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// current landing pad. We can leave the current lp, too - if it doesn&#39;t get</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00348" /><CodeLine lineNumber="348"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// split, then it will be the place traversal stops. Either way, the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00349" /><CodeLine lineNumber="349"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// discounted BBs will be checked if reachable and re-added.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00350" /><CodeLine lineNumber="350"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvvmintrrange-cpp/#ac5804672fc0850438d63caec770647f8">II</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;InvokeInst&gt;</a>(&amp;CB)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00351" /><CodeLine lineNumber="351"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;UnwindDest = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvvmintrrange-cpp/#ac5804672fc0850438d63caec770647f8">II</a>-&gt;getUnwindDest();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00352" /><CodeLine lineNumber="352"><Highlight kind="normal">    Successors.insert(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9aa408bc83db2292cc1a57a3e6b206c2">succ&#95;begin</a>(UnwindDest), <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa5684e4976198c1b64b694d3972ddf78">succ&#95;end</a>(UnwindDest));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00353" /><CodeLine lineNumber="353"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Same idea as above, we pretend we lose all these edges.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00354" /><CodeLine lineNumber="354"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;Succ : <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a26e2a938b431eaa6eca2beaa96410c9d">successors</a>(UnwindDest))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00355" /><CodeLine lineNumber="355"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Inserted.insert(Succ).second)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00356" /><CodeLine lineNumber="356"><Highlight kind="normal">        DomTreeUpdates.emplace&#95;back(DominatorTree::UpdateKind::Delete,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00357" /><CodeLine lineNumber="357"><Highlight kind="normal">                                    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const&#95;cast&lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">&gt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(UnwindDest),</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00358" /><CodeLine lineNumber="358"><Highlight kind="normal">                                    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const&#95;cast&lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">&gt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(Succ));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00359" /><CodeLine lineNumber="359"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00360" /><CodeLine lineNumber="360"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00361" /><CodeLine lineNumber="361"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Exclude the CallSiteBB, if it happens to be its own successor (1-BB loop).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00362" /><CodeLine lineNumber="362"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We are only interested in BBs the graph moves past the callsite BB to</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00363" /><CodeLine lineNumber="363"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// define the frontier past which we don&#39;t want to re-process BBs. Including</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00364" /><CodeLine lineNumber="364"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the callsite BB in this case would prematurely stop the traversal in</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00365" /><CodeLine lineNumber="365"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// finish().</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00366" /><CodeLine lineNumber="366"><Highlight kind="normal">  Successors.erase(&amp;CallSiteBB);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00367" /><CodeLine lineNumber="367"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00368" /><CodeLine lineNumber="368"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;BB : Successors)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00369" /><CodeLine lineNumber="369"><Highlight kind="normal">    LikelyToChangeBBs.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrsetimpl/#a9d834ae3da8c62c2b668dada51335eb0">insert</a>(BB);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00370" /><CodeLine lineNumber="370"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00371" /><CodeLine lineNumber="371"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Commit the change. While some of the BBs accounted for above may play dual</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00372" /><CodeLine lineNumber="372"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// role - e.g. caller&#39;s entry BB may be the same as the callsite BB - set</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00373" /><CodeLine lineNumber="373"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// insertion semantics make sure we account them once. This needs to be</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00374" /><CodeLine lineNumber="374"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// followed in &#96;finish&#96;, too.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00375" /><CodeLine lineNumber="375"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;BB : LikelyToChangeBBs)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00376" /><CodeLine lineNumber="376"><Highlight kind="normal">    FPI.updateForBB(&#42;BB, -1);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00377" /><CodeLine lineNumber="377"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00392" /><CodeLine lineNumber="392"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00393" /><CodeLine lineNumber="393"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Perform the deletes last, so that any new nodes connected to nodes</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00394" /><CodeLine lineNumber="394"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// participating in the edge deletion are known to the DT.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00399" /><CodeLine lineNumber="399"><Highlight kind="normal">  DT.applyUpdates(FinalDomTreeUpdates);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00400" /><CodeLine lineNumber="400"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="preprocessor">#ifdef EXPENSIVE&#95;CHECKS</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00401" /><CodeLine lineNumber="401"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(DT.verify(DominatorTree::VerificationLevel::Full));</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00403" /><CodeLine lineNumber="403"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> DT;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00404" /><CodeLine lineNumber="404"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00405" /><CodeLine lineNumber="405"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00406" /><CodeLine lineNumber="406" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/functionpropertiesupdater/#a53810b3b6ca8d3846b024899661c5e4a"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/functionpropertiesupdater/#a53810b3b6ca8d3846b024899661c5e4a">FunctionPropertiesUpdater::finish</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#adce09a5a0de0e3177eb00e932734af2f">FunctionAnalysisManager</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/passes/passbuilderbindings-cpp/#a83c7e5ca51099e4efa895791a02fb0ed">FAM</a>)</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00407" /><CodeLine lineNumber="407"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Update feature values from the BBs that were copied from the callee, or</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00408" /><CodeLine lineNumber="408"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// might have been modified because of inlining. The latter have been</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00409" /><CodeLine lineNumber="409"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// subtracted in the FunctionPropertiesUpdater ctor.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00410" /><CodeLine lineNumber="410"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// There could be successors that were reached before but now are only</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00411" /><CodeLine lineNumber="411"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// reachable from elsewhere in the CFG.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00412" /><CodeLine lineNumber="412"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// One example is the following diamond CFG (lines are arrows pointing down):</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00413" /><CodeLine lineNumber="413"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//    A</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00414" /><CodeLine lineNumber="414"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//  /   \\</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00415" /><CodeLine lineNumber="415"><Highlight kind="comment">  // B     C</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00416" /><CodeLine lineNumber="416"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// |     |</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00417" /><CodeLine lineNumber="417"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// |     D</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00418" /><CodeLine lineNumber="418"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// |     |</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00419" /><CodeLine lineNumber="419"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// |     E</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00420" /><CodeLine lineNumber="420"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//  \\   /</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00421" /><CodeLine lineNumber="421"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//    F</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00422" /><CodeLine lineNumber="422"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// There&#39;s a call site in C that is inlined. Upon doing that, it turns out</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00423" /><CodeLine lineNumber="423"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// it expands to</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00424" /><CodeLine lineNumber="424"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   call void @llvm.trap()</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00425" /><CodeLine lineNumber="425"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   unreachable</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00426" /><CodeLine lineNumber="426"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// F isn&#39;t reachable from C anymore, but we did discount it when we set up</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00427" /><CodeLine lineNumber="427"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// FunctionPropertiesUpdater, so we need to re-include it here.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00428" /><CodeLine lineNumber="428"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// At the same time, D and E were reachable before, but now are not anymore,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00429" /><CodeLine lineNumber="429"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// so we need to leave D out (we discounted it at setup), and explicitly</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00430" /><CodeLine lineNumber="430"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// remove E.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00431" /><CodeLine lineNumber="431"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/setvector">SetVector&lt;const BasicBlock &#42;&gt;</a> Reinclude;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00432" /><CodeLine lineNumber="432"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/setvector">SetVector&lt;const BasicBlock &#42;&gt;</a> Unreachable;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00433" /><CodeLine lineNumber="433"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;DT = getUpdatedDominatorTree(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/passes/passbuilderbindings-cpp/#a83c7e5ca51099e4efa895791a02fb0ed">FAM</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00434" /><CodeLine lineNumber="434"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00435" /><CodeLine lineNumber="435"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (&amp;CallSiteBB != &amp;&#42;Caller.begin())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00436" /><CodeLine lineNumber="436"><Highlight kind="normal">    Reinclude.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/setvector/#af34eb71cc483e84d2eca80575cb9ccde">insert</a>(&amp;&#42;Caller.begin());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00437" /><CodeLine lineNumber="437"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00438" /><CodeLine lineNumber="438"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Distribute the successors to the 2 buckets.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00439" /><CodeLine lineNumber="439"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;Succ : Successors)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00440" /><CodeLine lineNumber="440"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (DT.isReachableFromEntry(Succ))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00441" /><CodeLine lineNumber="441"><Highlight kind="normal">      Reinclude.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/setvector/#af34eb71cc483e84d2eca80575cb9ccde">insert</a>(Succ);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00442" /><CodeLine lineNumber="442"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00443" /><CodeLine lineNumber="443"><Highlight kind="normal">      Unreachable.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/setvector/#af34eb71cc483e84d2eca80575cb9ccde">insert</a>(Succ);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00444" /><CodeLine lineNumber="444"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00445" /><CodeLine lineNumber="445"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// For reinclusion, we want to stop at the reachable successors, who are at</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00446" /><CodeLine lineNumber="446"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the beginning of the worklist; but, starting from the callsite bb and</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00447" /><CodeLine lineNumber="447"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// ending at those successors, we also want to perform a traversal.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00448" /><CodeLine lineNumber="448"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// IncludeSuccessorsMark is the index after which we include successors.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00449" /><CodeLine lineNumber="449"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> IncludeSuccessorsMark = Reinclude.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/setvector/#a1a42c1ba878bd637f374197d05f0a97f">size</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00450" /><CodeLine lineNumber="450"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> CSInsertion = Reinclude.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/setvector/#af34eb71cc483e84d2eca80575cb9ccde">insert</a>(&amp;CallSiteBB);</Highlight></CodeLine>
